0.1.name: wordpress/customize-wp-admin
0.1.description: With Customize WP-admin you can customize your WP Admin. Easily remove any menu or submenu from the admin sidebar. You can also change the footer at wp-admin, the image and link of Wordpress on wp-login, and remoce the WP admin top bar from the frontend. Customizing this way your Wordpress experience.
